## JsPlumbListManager class

Provides methods to create/destroy scrollable lists.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class JsPlumbListManager 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addList(el, options)](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblistmanager.addlist) |  | Configure the given element as a scrollable list. |

|  [getList(el)](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblistmanager.getlist) |  | Gets the list associated with the given element, if any. |
|  [removeList(el)](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblistmanager.removelist) |  | Destroy any scrollable list associated with the given element. |
